page.title: 22A day in the life
page.content:
Last Saturday I went to the school fair I played coconut shy. There were six coconuts on some metal poles you needed to knock the coconuts off with a wooden ball. If you knock them off, you got to drink what is inside them, which is milk.

I also played spin the arrow you needed to pick a number between 1 and 10 then spin the arrow and make it land on that number you picked. If it landed on that number you got an air floater.

I played throw the toilet paper in the toilet, if you won you got a prize which was a whistle and a sweet.

Also I played crossbar challenge if you hit the crossbar once you got a brand new football if you hit it again you win some goalie gloves.

We played the raffle and we picked a number if it got called out you go and pick a drink.


Pupil- Montbelle School
